content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ the macchiato crochet poncho pattern is fun to work up in a bulky weight yarn the macchiato sweater is worked from the top down in sizes baby to 3x the puff row in the yoke add a soft wreath like detail this is a great addition to a fall and winter wardrobe the crochet pattern comes with a video tutorial in baby size check out the other macchiato patterns the macchiato sweater & hat crochet patterns also come with video tutorials 2 **pattern pack discounts** use code save10 for 10% off two patterns save15 for 15% off 3 patterns save20 for 20% off 4 or more patterns cannot be combined with other offers **crochet hook ** 6 0 mm j furls hook 3 **notions ** yarn needle scissors **yarn ** brava bulky shown in brindle for adult shown in dove heather for baby bulky weight yarn **yardage ** baby 360 yds 329m 3 balls toddler 600 yds 549m 5 balls child 900 yds 823m 7 balls adult 1 350 yds 1 234m 10 balls 1x-3x 1 550 yds 1 417m 12 balls alt alternatively blo -back loop only chain -chain flo -front loop only half_double_crochet -half_double_crochet increase - increase lp s -loop s st s -stitch es **gauge** 13 sts by 8 5 row = 4 square *see gauge notes in the pattern **measurements/sizes ** baby toddler child adult 1x-3x schematic in the pattern **skill level ** easy/advanced beginner this pattern was originally released in october of 2020 updated and re-released february of 2024 **let s be friends on social media ** website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 4 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 5 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 6 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 7 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 8 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 9 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2020 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner you are welcome to sell finished items all patterns are copyrighted please do not copy sell or redistribute this pattern in any way all photographs in listing and patterns are not to be used for the sale of your item originally published in october of 2020 re-released february 2024 1 https //brianakdesigns com/macchiato-poncho-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //brianakdesigns com/macchiato-sweater-and-beanie/ 3 http //furlscrochet com#oid=1069_6 4 http //www brianakdesigns com/ 5 https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 6 https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/
